Ocean Jam Winners!

Last month we wrapped up our fourth game jam: Ocean Jam! We received a ton of amazing submissions this time around; the whole team had a blast playing the games and we had a tough time choosing our favorites.

First Place: The Three Brave Cats
 

In lucasmayhew’s Three Brave Cats, the legendary Captain Cat sets sail with his friends Sam and Coco to save the world from the evil Robot Cat! This elaborate multi-level, multiplayer game has incredible depth and a great storyline, we’re sure that everyone will have a blast playing it!

Second Place: The Jolly Dodger
 

Outfit your ship and sail into enemy territory to plunder some booty and steal all the glory! Dodge enemy fire or you will become someone else’s sunken treasure in Andrew-ski’s The Jolly Dodger. This is a delightful, well-made game with a lot of challenge as well!

Third Place: War Subs
 

Fight for parts in Rishi’s beautifully-designed War Subs! Win battles with enemy ships to gain parts for your own submarine, and try out different combos. With over a thousand possible submarine builds for both your craft and the enemies, this game is tailor-made for players who love customization and strategic building.

Honorable Mentions

These are some games that the judges also loved! Give them a play, we’re sure you’ll enjoy yourself.

   


Sea Wolf by Roberto
You are the captain of a submarine. Use the A button to fire torpedoes at your enemies.

An Ocean Mystery by Dreadmask197
Play a daring detective and solve this high-seas mystery!


Soggy Socks by Andrew-ski
The tide is coming in and you better run before you end up with… SOGGY SOCKS!

Dugong Peace Game by eoin
Dugongs just want peace, but they’re threatened by an ever-expanding airbase.


Fishy Fishy Cross my Ocean! by UnsignedArduino
Cross the dangerous ocean filled with a number of sharks to get to the other side!

Caballito Saltarin by Blanca
Dodge pollution and plastic waste while trying to get to the end in this lovely platformer.


The little fishing Boat by Cristina
You are a little fishing boat, and you must cast your nets to bring in the day’s haul!

Migration Man by Rishi
Draw a route from the starting place to the destination for marine animals to follow.


Sam the scuba diver by DuckmanTheCoder
A short platformer with wonderful art, about a scuba diver named Sam.

Fish life by RetroDude128
Live like a fish!


Nautical by ludumStudios
Traverse the sea in your submarine, avoiding enemy vehicles and making sure to stay fueled up!

fish bot by the_pro551
You are a robotic fish; protect the fish tank from enemies in this twist-filled game!


In The Depths by Thomas
Play as a diver exploring the Mariana Trench to collect data about the mysterious creatures that dwell in the depths.
